::Killfest/Greven/Scyther/EndBringer/Demise::

Killfest looks up, hearing the scream. He walks out of his room.

"Everyone, follow me," he says into his internal communication system 
with his team. Doors opened, his team walking out. At the council 
door, Scyther turns around, cloaked as he makes his way toward 
Killfest.

Several moments later, Killfest enters the CR room, just in time to 
hear the exchange between Megatron and Drillbit.EndBringer, Greven, 
and Demise walk in behind him. All four dwarfed the other Predacons 
in the room. Killfest narrows his eyes as he looks at KitKat.

"I just spoke to her," he says, "I am to take command of the Predacon 
forces, by her orders."

The three bots stood behind him, ready to tear anyone who disagreed 
to pieces.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Cloaked, Scyther silently enters the CR room, looking at Killfest, 
knowing that no one could see or detect him.






--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, JP3884@a... wrote:
>        Megatron entered the room to see Kitkat die, and then 
Drillbit whine 
> over it. That was not the Predacon way...
>        "I shall now assume complete control over the predacon 
forces within 
> this base, as the next highest ranking officer it is my duty and 
privilage. 
> Waspinator, move the body into a burial pod. We will leave cargo 
bay 5 open 
> for the mourners. Now, Hell Beast and i shall go to the bridge to 
make some 
> needed changes."
